control

Class General

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.General

  • public class General
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Robert on 5/10/17. This is a class that holds general methods that other classes may more may not use.

        public static boolean isEmailFree(java.lang.String email)

      • clickedInside

        public static boolean clickedInside(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int width,
                                    int height,
                                    java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        This method checks to see if you clicked within a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the top left corner of the rectangle.
        y - The y position of the top left corner of the rectangle.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
        height - The height of the rectangle.
        e - The mouse event object.
        Returns:
        Whether you clicked inside the box.
